item.title: Radiate
item.author: Gavin
item.description: Idea A Rust based distributed computation engine. How? No idea just yet

item.title: August 6th Week In Review
item.author: Gavin
item.description: Enjoyed a week of relaxation at the beach. I want to do something similar to the Tim Ferriss 5 Bullet Friday where I share stuff that I found interesting this past week. Podcasts I enjoyed: The Tim Ferriss Show episode with Dustin Moskovitz. I’m playing around with the time budget google sheet template. The Ethan Hawke episode of Armchair Expert resonated with me. Lots of conversation around taking risks and learning from failure.

item.title: Something New
item.author: Gavin
item.description: I have wanted to run a website for a bit to capture fun things that I am up to. I was inspired listening to “The Tim Ferriss Show” with Derek Sivers episode. In particular, I thought it was super cool the way Sivers achieves tech independence and decided to give it a try. This site may be nothing or something, but I want to share things I’m learning and practice my writing.
